name: @full-event-calendar/root
description: Full-event calendar with drag and drop in JavaScript

scripts.build-demo-que: cd ./packages/utils && pnpm run build && cd ../locale && pnpm run build && cd ../shared-types && pnpm run build  && cd ../group-grid && pnpm run build && cd ../basic-grid && pnpm run build && cd ../daily-grid && pnpm run build && cd ../weekly-grid && pnpm run build && cd ../month-grid && pnpm run build && cd ../list && pnpm run build && cd ../core && pnpm run build  && cd ../vue3 && pnpm run build && cd ../react && pnpm run build
scripts.docs:build: vitepress build docs && cd ./packages/vue3 && pnpm run build-demo && cd ../.. && node ./scripts/build-demo.js

author: Amirkian adl
